description: This file defines the interface IAppManager within the WPEFramework namespace. It includes nested notification interface, method declarations for managing applications (launch, close, load, set properties, etc.), and external references to other types. The file appears to be part of a framework for application management on a device or platform.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for managing applications, providing methods to register notifications, get app lists, launch, load, close, and manipulate applications.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Nested interface within IAppManager for receiving application lifecycle events such as install, uninstall, state change, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification observer for app events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification observer for app events.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list of launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list of currently loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application given its ID, intent, and arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an application with specific intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an app for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes a specified application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates a specified application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears data for a specific app.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specific application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific app.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Gets a property value for an app.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property value for an app.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Retrieves maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Retrieves maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets max flash storage usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Retrieves max flash storage usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets maximum inactive RAM usage.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Gets maximum inactive RAM usage.

search-terms: Memory and storage limits for apps

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
